quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is not the critic who counts; not the man who points out how the strong man stumbles. The credit belongs to the man who is actually in the arena.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only man who never makes mistakes is the man who never does anything.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: A country boy can survive.
quotes.author: Hank Williams Jr.

quotes.text: If you mind your own business, you won't be minding mine.
quotes.author: Hank Williams Jr.

quotes.text: I learned all the basics from my father. He taught me about songwriting and how to take care of business.
quotes.author: Hank Williams Jr.

quotes.text: Everyone has a plan until they get punched in the mouth.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: Discipline is doing what you hate to do but doing it like you love it.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: I'm a dreamer. I have to dream and reach for the stars, and if I miss a star then I grab a handful of clouds.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: Fear is your best friend or your worst enemy. It's like fire. If you can control it, it can cook for you; if you can't, it will burn everything around you and destroy you.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Well done is better than well said.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.text: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.text: Lead me, follow me, or get out of my way.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.text: Courage is fear holding on a minute longer.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: The man who has no imagination has no wings.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: I am the greatest, I said that even before I knew I was.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, it's the size of the fight in the dog.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did do.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Continuous effort, not strength or intelligence, is the key to unlocking our potential.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill
